Class StateOnlyDependentPolicy<S,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma2.sel.simlab.jeqn.policies.StateOnlyDependentPolicy<S,D>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Policy, StatePolicy<S>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CountNTriggeringPolicy, ImplicitButNotEsplicitMaskingStateOnlyDependentPolicy, InfiniteSourceTerminationPolicy, ObjectSequencePolicy, SCANSelectionPolicy

    public abstract class StateOnlyDependentPolicy<S,D>
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatePolicy<S>
    Identifies a decision policy that depends only on the internal state
    Author:
    Daniele Gianni
